name: Cookies Manager
author: Faster Themes

sections.description:
The Cookies Manager plugin allows you to set or get cookies used in a website. This plugin also allows users to set cookies as ‘permanent’ cookies. Its fully responsive plugin and
its based on twitter bootstrap framework.

Demo Link : Cookies Manager WordPress Plugin
sections.installation:
You can install Cookies Manager directly from the WordPress admin panel:

1. Visit the Plugins > Add New and search for 'Cookies Manager'.
2. Click to install.
3. Once installed, activate and it is functional.

OR

Manual Installation:

1. Download the plugin, then extract it.
2. Activate the plugin through the 'Plugins' menu in WordPress

You’re done! The plugin is ready to use, for more please check the plugin description.

More documentation

Go to http://cookiesmanager.fasterthemes.com/

short_description: Cookies Manager plugin allows you to set or get cookies used in a website. This plugin also allows users to set cookies as 'permanent'.
description:
The Cookies Manager plugin allows you to set or get cookies used in a website. This plugin also allows users to set cookies as ‘permanent’ cookies. Its fully responsive plugin and
its based on twitter bootstrap framework.

Demo Link : Cookies Manager WordPress Plugin

screenshots.caption: You need to click on cookies manager link in the bootom of the page to open cookies manager pop-up.
It allows users to set cookies or get cookies from web site by clicking on 'Set Cookie' for set cookies and 'Get Cookie' for get cookies.
It allows users to set cookies as permanent by marking cookies as permanent and saving them.
